'''Mythcon 8''' was the eighth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' The "Lesser" Works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
*'''Guest of Honor:''' [[Richard L. Purtill]] (Inklings scholar and fantasy author)
*'''Chairman:''' Bruce McMenomy
*'''Coordinators:''' Andy Howard and Sandi Howard
